DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : MISSION VIEJO ; MEETING TO FOCUS_ON DIAL-A-RIDE CHANGES
DOC.TEXT: Changes for the Dial-A-Ride program in South County , which may include phasing_out the service for elderly persons , will be discussed at a public meeting on March 7 . The Orange County Transit Authority , operators of the county bus system and the Dial-A-Ride program , is looking_for input from the community on this and several other changes that will take_place in 1994 . The meeting will take_place at the Norman P . Murray Community and Senior Center , 24932 Oso Viejo , at 12:30 p.m. Seniors who do not qualify for special transportation services would have to take the bus , said senior center officials . Anyone not_able to attend the public session can contact the transit authority at ( 800 ) 564-4ADA . For more information about the March 7 meeting , call ( 714 ) 348-2062 . FRANK MESSINA
